description:
Welcome to my 3rd course on "Statistics concepts - Measures of Dispersion" In this course, you will learn the concepts of Measures of Dispersion . Measures of Dispersion would enable to understand that what extent series data can deviate from an average

  • Understand Basic concepts of statistics and Measures of Dispersion . This course has lot of material in the form of PDF Files.

This course is suitable for Finance as well as Non Finance Students who would like to understand dispersion from the average data and its analysis.

Students taking up professional courses like CA / CMA / CS can take this course to understand this topic covered in their foundation level exams.

Under graduate students who have taken up Bachelor of Commerce, B Sc (Statistics) can also take this course.

This course will help you to gain strong foundation in basics of business statistics in Measures of Dispersion.
title: Statistics Concepts - Measures of Dispersion Step by Step
